ADJUSTMENTS.DRAGPOS: Click and drag to fine-tune position
ADJUSTMENTS.DRAGSIZE: Click and drag to fine-tune size
ADJUSTMENTS.HINT: Fine tune the position and size of the shadow.
ADJUSTMENTS.LABEL: Adjustments

ALIGNMENT.HINT: Where to align the shadow relative to its token.
ALIGNMENT.LABEL: Alignment

BLOB.HINT: A simple, circular shadow placed below the token.
BLOB.LABEL: Blob Shadow

ELEVATIONADJUST.HINT: If enabled, will move the shadow based on the token's elevation.
ELEVATIONADJUST.LABEL: Adjust for Elevation

ELEVATIONINCREMENT.HINT: Increment by which the shadow will be moved when adjusting for token elevation
ELEVATIONINCREMENT.LABEL: Elevation Increment

ENABLE.HINT: Uncheck to turn off all sprite shadows.
ENABLE.LABEL: Enable Sprite Shadows

LIFTTOKEN.HINT: When enabled, will move the token instead of the shadow if Adjust for Elevation is also enabled.
LIFTTOKEN.LABEL: Lift Token

ROTATION.HINT: Angle by which to rotate the shadow
ROTATION.LABEL: Rotation

SKEW.HINT: The amount by which to skew this shadow, to simulate projection angle.
SKEW.LABEL: Skew Amount

STENCIL.HINT: A faux-3d shadow based on the token's texture.
STENCIL.LABEL: Stencil Shadow

STENCILIMAGE.HINT: The image to use for the shape of the stencil shadow.
STENCILIMAGE.LABEL: Image

TOOLTIPS.EXPORT: Export the current configuration as JSON

TYPE.HINT: Toggle between blob and stencil shadow
TYPE.LABEL: Shadow Type

USEIMAGE.HINT: When configured, will use a separate image for the shape of the stencil shadow. Note: If you are using the Sprite Animations module, this setting will disable integration with it.
USEIMAGE.LABEL: Use Image for Shape
